title: A Chance For The Jnr Champs
body:
personally, i think everyone should express their love for Lol, but me being only the ripe old age of 13, i cant join a major team or comp.

So i had the idea of a Lol Jnr Series, that give that unknown young champs of Lol to prove to the world, that being young doesn't hold us back.

please riot, make this happen, if possible.


Thank you for taking your time to read this XD.{{summoner:4}}
